column1: Uchi////We enjoyed a number of hot and cold dishes
column3: which may be the most stand-out item on the menu.  Everything was very unique.  Nothing can be categorized as sweet
column8: there are complex and balanced layers to the flavor of each menu item.  The sashimi was of excellent quality.  God
column9: this review reads so boring.  It was honestly just so good that I don't have a lot to compare it with
column10: or a lot more to say.
